features: H13 True HEPA Air Purifier - KOIOS air purifier for home has a 3-stage filtration system: pre-filter, H13 true HEPA filter, and high-efficiency activated carbon filter. Effectively Clean air pollutants, like dust, pet dander, pollen, smoke, and house odor. Suitable for any style of room such as a living room, bedroom, kitchen, office, baby room, basement, car, hotel, desktop, etc. perfectly solve air quality problems in small areas such as pet room, and office desktop.

Efficient and 20dB Operating Quietly- The air purifier for the room desktop features 360° air intake and a powerful motor, which can clean up to 140 ft² in 25 minutes, and 300 ft² in 60 minutes. It takes one single press of the same button to turn it on/off and control the fan speed（3 Fan Speeds）. The operation couldn't be easier.

Air purifiers with Portable Design- Not only can this air purifier for dust get rid of air pollutants but also can be a good partner for your travel, driving, and office. The unique handle design allows you to carry it anywhere, and breathe fresh air at any time. The small and minimalist design is elegant and stylish, Perfect for pet owners, babies, children, the elderly, or anyone wanting to improve the air quality.

User-Friendly- 1.When you are going to sleep or go out, turn on the 5-hour timer off function. 2. Filter lifetime indicator for your convenience. 3. The blue light is optional (it serves as a friendly, calming night light), night light can be turned off to enjoy a perfect night of sleep without the effect of light. (When the machine is running press and hold the button on the body for 3 seconds to turn on/off the night light).

What You Get - Portable air purifier, 3-in-1 filter, USB-C charging cable (the plug is not included), and KOIOS instruction manual. A 2-year warranty is provided. Tips: Only use genuine KOIOS replacement filters (search for B0BYNLC5WN) for the best results and product performance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: There are three speeds, very quiet and I feel like this works pretty well. I wish the 2 Amp plug would have been included and also wish the filter was washable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2019
reviews.reviewText: 11/17/2019 UPDATE: I've been using this air cleaner now long enough to give it a fair review. It works great. The air is noticeably cleaner. I have a large pet parrot and the feather dust is a challenge for any air cleaning device. It's doing a great job. Also, I contacted customer service about the light and they were very helpful. There's a video in the video section of the listing that shows you how to remove the LED lights. Also, customer service told me that they are upgrading this model to another one that has a light shut-off option. Even though it's too late for me, at least they are listening to customer feedback and making necessary changes where needed and wanted by customers. Overall, I'm happy with this unit. Thank you customer service for your help.It's hard to rate this honestly, because I've only been using it for a month.1. The noise level is good. It's alot quieter than previous air purifiers I've had.2. A big negative for me: The light is extremely bright BLUE AND YOU CAN'T SHUT IT OFF. Why would they make this machine with a light so bright that it says on all the time? I use this in my bedroom, so I had to shut it off for the night! Defeats the purpose.3. The instructions are hard to understand; poor English4. It doesn't look like it's going to be easy to change the filter when the time comes5. There was a weird smell that came from the machine when I first ran it, but it was gone within a day. It's fine now.6. I tooks like there's no way to disconnect the top and bottom of the machine to replace the filter. I read a review where the customer said that they tried to replace the filter (removing the bottom) and it fell apart. He also stated that when he contacted customer service, they never got back to him to help in any way.I wish I had read that before I bought this machine. I think I'm going to stick to getting things like this from stores. At least you can return them for a refund if the manufacturer won't respond to defects in their products.MY REMEDY FOR THE HORRID, GLARING BLUE LIGHT: Cloth electrical tape around the middle (tape I got from Amazon for another reason). When all is said and done, I don't expect much out of this machine. If it lasts 5 months, then I got my money's worth and it will go into the landfill where all other substandard products go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Small Spaces
reviews.reviewText: We bought this air purifier for the laundry room where we keep the cat's litter box. It works surprisingly well to control orders and keeps the air fresh. It's small and compact, quite running and easy to set up. The reason I gave it 4 stars was the USB plug with no charger block. It seems like this would have been an inexpensive addition. Also, make sure you order the correct size replacement filter. It uses H13 compatible with P40 air purifiers. We installed 7 weeks ago and plan to change every 3 months. So far, so good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my use
reviews.reviewText: First day review. Just to be safe, I selected it to arrive in Amazon packaging which helped protect the inner packaging. The unit arrived in perfect condition and was packed nicely. The purifier is the perfect size for my desktop and doesn't take up a lot of room. It's about the size of 2/3 of a 2 liter soda bottle. It's nicely made and attractive on the desk. Even on high speed and 3' away the fan is pretty quite and the white noise is soothing. I ran it all night long w/o using the timer. The night light was pretty cool too as seen in the photo.I'm not so sure it would purify an entire bedroom but I didn't buy it for that. Just for my immediate work area. All in all, I'm very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My little travel buddy
reviews.reviewText: I was recently diagnosed with EOE. If you don’t know what that is, it’s an allergic reaction causing my stomach and esophagus to get inflamed when I come in contact with things that I am allergic to. It could be something I eat or an inhale allergen. When this happens I can easily choke on food, have severe stomach cramps, and break out and severe eczema. Not fun.This little guy is easy to pack in my suitcase and even fits in my work backpack. So if I have to travel for work, I can still have an air purifier wherever I’m working and even at the hotel. It works great is easy to use and I definitely have a lot less issues when I remember to take it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my office and so far so good. The air is fresher. Even on high it is quiet enough t be on the phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does it really work
reviews.reviewText: Not sure if it really work smell is still there.Right now just peace of mind the air is circulating.Was aware it did not come with USB cable and plug

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really needs 2 amp power supply
reviews.reviewText: Very nice unit for a small space. Quiet and easy to control.One comment: Be sure to use a 2 amp power supply (as stated). Othewise, the fan speed will not go to "high" (turns off).

I like the size of the unit. It is easy to replace the filter. The high speed setting is quite noisy and could be a problem if you are a light sleeper, however, the low speed is acceptable. It's nice to have a night light that can be switched off if you don't want it.

It has two settings, high is louder but it's not 'loud'. I quite like the white noise, actually, and have no problem sleeping with it on high. Low is near-silent. Yes, it has a blue light that's on whenever the machine is on, this helps me remember to turn it off. There is a plastic-y smell when you first run it, and it was gone by day three. It's been highly effective and helped me so mich with my allergies and asthma. I love it. Very reasonable. Good quality. Zero complaints whatsoever and their staff is fantastic.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fait bien le boulot pour le prix
reviews.reviewText: Acheté pour enlever les odeurs de la litière dh chat et fait très bien le boulot. Un peu brillant par contre

I love the function of this product. It helped with my chronic cough from environmental pollutants so now I do not cough anymore. It took 7 weeks from coughing for 1.6 years to resolve. It is however very bright and the light can be covered with a headband, but the base still glows. Great for daytime use, but not recommended for night use if one requires complete darkness to sleep (like me). But you could always get an eye mask.
Correcte pour le prix mais n’aide pas vraiment à enlever les odeurs comme mentionné meme minimes mis dans une minuscule pièce pourtant mais semble filtrer la poussière
